updateMovement() - Method in class com.mygdx.pirategame.entities.Player
updates the force applied to the player using the equation f = (a - cu) f - Force a - Maximum acceleration c - Constant u - Current velocity of the player NOTE: this equation is using f = ma as its base assuming m = 1
